entry.title: Git | Tips and Tricks
entry.summary:
Git Tips and Tricks
Git is a powerful version control system that can make your development workflow more efficient. Here are some tips and tricks to help you get the most out of Git.
Configure Git Before you start using Git, it’s a good idea to configure it with your name and email address. This information will be associated with your commits.

entry.title: Configure QoS within API Gateway using ocelot and Polly

link.title: Configure QoS within API Gateway using ocelot and Polly

entry.summary: Introduction API Gateway is an entry point for backend application. It maintains routing, authentication, logging, service discovery etc. Ocelot is used to design and develop API gateway for .net based application. entry.title: AZ-400 Certification Path
entry.summary:
Microsoft certification paths changes
Both the MCSD and MCT certifications were discontinued by Microsoft in 2017. They were replaced by newer certification programs that reflect the changing demands of the tech industry and the evolving needs of professionals.
